trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rockville
There were no other sightings in Rockville on or around May 11th 2009
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 11:20 pm est on 5\11\2009 i spotted a low flying orange sphere approximately 1 mile north-east of the rockville woman's prison in rockville, in. the object moved at a fast speed across the sky before stopping, suddenly. it hovered for approximately 5 minutes before abruptly disappearing from sight. the night in question was clear, with temps in the low 50's.
Summary: Large glowing orange orb hovers low over field.
